name: Fluffymon
inheritedEffect:
[When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] You may suspend 1
                            other Digimon with as much or less DP as this
                            Digimon.

name: Biyomon
effect:
＜Fortitude＞ (When this Digimon with digivolution
                            cards is deleted, play this card without paying the
                            cost.)

name: Falcomon
effect:
[When Attacking] Suspend 1 of your opponent's
                            Digimon.

name: Pteromon
effect:
[On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1
                            card with [Avian] or [Bird] in any of its traits and
                            1 card with the [Vortex Warriors] or [LIBERATOR]
                            trait among them to the hand. Return the rest to the
                            bottom of the deck.

name: Muchomon
effect:
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When effects suspend
                            this Digimon, 1 of your Digimon with [Avian] or
                            [Bird] in any of its traits or the [Vortex Warriors]
                            trait gets +3000 DP until the end of your opponent's
                            turn.
inheritedEffect:
＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes
                            your opponent's Digimon in battle, it checks
                            security before the attack ends.)

name: Kiwimon
effect:
[On Play] [On Deletion] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
(Rule) Trait: Has [Vegetation] Type.

name: Kokatorimon
effect:
＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker
                            timing.)
inheritedEffect:
＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes
                            your opponent's Digimon in battle, it checks
                            security before the attack ends.)

name: Galemon
effect:
[Security] You may play 1 card with the [LIBERATOR] trait and a play cost of 4 or less from your hand or trash without paying the cost.
＜Vortex＞ (At the end of your turn, this Digimon may attack an opponent's Digimon. With this effect, it can attack the turn it was played.)

name: Deramon
effect:
＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.)
[On Deletion] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Avian], [Bird], [Vegetation] or [Plant] in any of its traits and 3000 DP or less from your hand without paying the cost.
(Rule) Trait: Has [Vegetation] Type.

name: GrandGalemon
effect:
[On Play][When Digivolving] Suspend 1 Digimon. If
                            this effect suspended your Digimon, you may play 1
                            Digimon card with [Avian] or [Bird] in any of its
                            traits and 3000 DP or less from your hand without
                            paying the cost.
inheritedEffect:
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When this Digimon
                            attacks your opponent's Digimon, this Digimon may
                            unsuspend.

name: Parrotmon
effect:
[On Play] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
                            Then, 1 of their Digimon can't unsuspend until the
                            end of their turn.
inheritedEffect:
＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes
                            your opponent's Digimon in battle, it checks
                            security before the attack ends.)

name: Zephagamon
effect:
＜Vortex＞ (At the end of your turn, this Digimon may attack an opponent's Digimon. With this effect, it can attack the turn it was played.)
[When Digivolving] Suspend 1 Digimon. Then, unsuspend 1 Digimon.
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When any Digimon unsuspend, for the turn, this Digimon isn't affected by the effects of your opponent's Digimon and gets +3000 DP.
(Rule) Trait: Has [Bird Dragon] Type.

name: Eaglemon
effect:
＜Fortitude＞ (When this Digimon with digivolution cards is deleted, play this card without paying the cost.)
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Return 1 of your opponent's suspended Digimon to the hand.

name: Shoto Kazama
effect:
[Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 or less memory, set it to 3.
[Your Turn] When any of your Digimon attack your opponent's Digimon, by suspending this Tamer, you may change the attack target to another of your opponent's Digimon or a player.
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

name: Anemoi Embrace
effect:
[Main] Suspend 1 Digimon. If this effect suspended
                            your Digimon, return 1 of your opponent's suspended
                            Digimon to the bottom of the deck. Then, unsuspend 1
                            Digimon.
securityEffect:
[Security] Return 1 of your opponent's suspended
                            Digimon to the bottom of the deck.

name: Green Memory Boost!
effect:
[Main] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 green Digimon card among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck. Then, place this card in the battle area.
[Main] ＜Delay＞ (By trashing this card after the placing turn, activate the effect.)
・Gain 2 memory.
securityEffect: [Security] Place this card in the battle area.

name: Offense Training
effect:
[Main] Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 red card among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck. Then, place this card in the battle area.
[Main] ＜Delay＞ (By trashing this card after the placing turn, activate the effect.)
・1 of your Digimon may digivolve into a red Digimon card in the hand with the digivolution cost reduced by 2.
securityEffect: [Security] Place this card in the battle area.
